name: Cactus Flower
description: The Cactus Flower is a hardy plant that thrives in arid conditions. Known for its resilience and minimal watering needs, it's a popular choice for those seeking a low-maintenance yet striking addition to their home or garden. The flower blooms in vibrant colors, adding a unique beauty to any space.

name: Tulip
description: Tulips are a classic springtime flower, symbolizing renewal and fresh beginnings. With their delicate petals and a wide variety of colors, tulips brighten any garden or indoor arrangement. These flowers are not only beautiful but also easy to grow, making them a favorite among gardeners.

name: Sunflower
description: Sunflowers are known for their large, vibrant yellow blooms and their ability to track the sun across the sky. They bring a cheerful atmosphere to any space and are perfect for gardens that receive plenty of sunlight. They are also symbolic of loyalty and happiness.

name: Daisy
description: Daisies are simple yet charming flowers that bloom in abundance. Their bright yellow centers and white petals are a timeless combination, often symbolizing innocence and purity. They grow easily in a variety of conditions and are a great addition to wildflower gardens.
